Welcome To My Page

Software Developer | Chemical Engineer

Hello, I am Gulcan Coskun ...

I graduated with a Chemical Process Engineering degree from Middle East Technical University in Turkey, and I completed my master’s degree in Chemical Engineering at Ankara University, in 2018.

I worked as a chemical engineer on a project called Immobilization of Candida antarctica Lipase on Nanomaterials and Investigation of Enzyme Activity and Enantioselectivity. Next, I wrote a scientific article on this topic and it was published in Applied Biochemistry and Biotechnology on October 06, 2020.

In 2021, I decided to learn new technologies in the IT sector. The reason for this decision was that technology is advancing very quickly and knowing a programming language provides me a great advantage in chemical engineering and all fields.

I am currently working as an SAP technical consultant. My expertise is in the area of SAP ABAP (object oriented language), SAP HANA, SAP UI5, Git and SQL.

I also have skills in web development such as JavaScript, ReactJS, VueJS, NodeJS, ExpressJS, Rest APIs, MongoDB, HTML5, CSS, Sass, Bootstrap and responsive design.

I spend most of my time researching the latest technological developments in the world of IT and improving my technical skills.
